resources.string:
* Click on the buttons in order to unscramble a complete 4 letter correct word!
 * The letters of the word are scrambled randomly on the buttons.
 * By touching a button the letter on the button will be visible on the text Screen.
 * One needs to unscramble the word by simply touching right pattern of buttons forming a correct word on the text Screen.
 * A red color on the text means the word formed by user is incorrect ,
 while a green color proves its correct.
 * Once incorrect the user wont be able to revert back the buttons, better not to waste time and keep going.
 * There is a time limit in the game, depending upon the level chosen.
 * To skip a particular word in case you are unaware of the correct word, click on the text screen.
